title: Pins (Nailed to the King)
coachIntro: A pinned piece is a prisoner. Treat it like one.
summary: Learn how to pin enemy pieces to their King or Queen, exploit pinned pieces, and break free when you are pinned.

tasks.prompt: Use your piece to pin his piece to the King so that it cannot move.
tasks.successMessage: Good. That piece is nailed to the King. If it moves, the King dies.

tasks.prompt: Pin his piece to the Queen. If the piece moves, the Queen falls.
tasks.successMessage: Correct. The piece is tied to its Queen. Any move would be a confession of guilt.

tasks.prompt: His piece is already pinned. Your job now is to increase the pressure and win it.
tasks.successMessage: Excellent. A pin is not just a pretty picture. You must attack the prisoner until it breaks.

tasks.prompt: Your piece is pinned. Do not move the pinned piece. Attack the piece that is pinning you.
tasks.successMessage: Good. You did not panic. You attacked the sniper instead of running with the hostage.

tasks.prompt: Step your King out of the line so that your piece is no longer pinned.
tasks.successMessage: Exactly. Once the King steps aside, the pin disappears like smoke.
